## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G25730](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G25730)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtTRM7b, TRM7b</u>
- **Gene Name:** tRNA methyltransferase 7b
- **Description:**   FtsJ-like methyltransferase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2117487
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
